gyrate.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to turn around fast in circles
gyrate.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The dancers gyrated wildly to the beat of the music.
gyrate.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if the value of money in business gyrates, it moves up and down a lot
gyrate.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Stock and bond markets have gyrated in recent weeks.
